column4: Silence is gold and gags are better than gold.
(A kidnapper crosses your path and makes a devious smile.)  I will be mercifull If you surrender now.
(A kidnapper taps on your shoulder and smile.)  A gift that's already wrapped up!  So easy.
(She surrenders to you.)  You've won a battle, but not the war.
(She crosses her arms and smiles.)  Now you're mine!
(You surrender as she grabs your arms and restrains them.)  That was easy!
(A kidnapper runs down the hall to meet you.)  I've heard about you and I will kidnap you!
(A kidnapper runs down the hall to meet you.)  You will be my easiest victim today.
(She surrenders to you.)  Well done, I'll think twice before facing you again.
(She cheers and jumps of joy.)  Yes!  You make a cute victim.
(She quickly restrains your arms as you give up without a fight.)  I was expecting a bigger fight.
(A league member chases you down.)  I recognize you!  You're the famous Lady of Ropes!  The bounty will be mine.
(A league member chases you down.)  The Lady of Ropes?  Already restrained?  It will be an easy bounty for me.
(She surrenders and bows her head.)  There's no shame in losing against the Lady of Ropes.
(She seems amazed of her victory.)  Wow!  I've kidnapped the famous Lady of Ropes!
(She's surprised to see you surrender but restrains your arms anyway.)  The Lady of Ropes surrender?
(You end up face to face with another league member.)  It's been a while, but I think I'm in the mood for a fight.
(You end up face to face with another league member.)  I see you lost your last match.  Do you need help?  Or more trouble?
(She surrenders and sighs.)  I should give up on kidnappings, I'm horrible at it.
(She smiles seeing you struggle.)  I didn't thought I would win, this is amazing.
(She sighs and restrains your arms.)  You should be punished for surrendering without a fight.
(A kidnapper sneaks up behind you.)  Surrender now or get ready for the fight of your life!
(A kidnapper sneaks up behind you.)  Some like to fight and some, like me, prefer easy victims.
(She bows her head and looks at the floor.)  Impressive.  Do what you want with me Miss.
(You struggle as she does a thumbs up.)  I knew I would win.  Now you're mine girl.
(You barely struggle as she restrain your arms securely.)  You got scared?  You should be.
(A league bounty hunter stares at you.)  Someone put a bounty on you and I will get it.
(A league bounty hunter stares at you.)  Easiest bounty ever!  Come with me girl.
(She seems disappointed.)  Well done Miss.  Now I know why there's a bounty on you.
(She gloats on her victory.)  Alright!  The bounty is mine!
(You surrender without a fight as she quickly restrains your arms.)  Easiest bounty ever!
Look at me, I cannot help you now.
(She first shakes her head to avoid the gag, but finally surrenders as you silence her.)
(You remove her gag while she stretches her mouth.)  Thanks Miss, it's hard to dispatch maids with that gag.
(She sighs and turns around while you restrain her arms.)  It might be a little hard to work like that Miss.
(You free her arms and she nods happily.)  Thanks a lot Miss.
(She submits to you while you restrain her legs securely.)  I don't need to move anyway.
(You release her legs from the restraint.)  Let me know if I can help you Miss.
(She looks puzzled as you restrain her feet.)  I'll stay on guard here Miss.
(You release her feet and she wiggles them.)  Thanks Miss, it was troublesome.
(You strap the collar on her while she blushes.)  You're quite a Dominant Miss.
(You remove the collar around her neck.)  Thanks Miss.
(You snap the belt around her waist and crotch while she sighs.)  No more fun for the crew.
(You unlock the belt from her waist and she smiles.)  Thanks a lot Miss DialogPlayerName.
(You strap the device on her head as she nods slowly.)  This will not make my job easier Miss.
(You remove the device and she nods rapidly.)  Thanks a million, this is much better.
